com.galou.moodtracker.controllers.adapter

Class MoodAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MoodViewHolder>
      • com.galou.moodtracker.controllers.adapter.MoodAdapter

  • public class MoodAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MoodViewHolder>
    Represent a Mood Adapter

    Bind the RecyclerView from History Fragment with the MoodViewHolder A RecyclerView.Adapter subclass

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    galou
    See Also:
    MoodViewHolder, HistoryFragment
